oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Certificate of Honorable Service
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Certificate of Honorable Service for Pvt. Henry Thayer Dean, Co. B, 141st Regt. Ohio National Guard Vol. Inf., USA, born Feb. 21, 1842 in Athens, Ohio. Document reads "The President's Thanks and Certificate of Honorable Service" to the Ohio Volunteers for One Hundred Days of Service. According to document, they served in Virginia campaigns in the Shenandoah Valley and in Petersburg and Richmond. The certificate is signed by President Abraham Lincoln and Secretary of War Edwin M. Stanton.
